name: Die (Pedatte)
description:
The game

Thrust in an arena to fight for your life, you won't get rewarded, you won't get to live. Your only "satisfaction" will be to entertain the overlords betting on your survivability. You're screwed, but knocking out a few card-monsters on the way out might turn out to be fun. Enjoy your last hurrah!

Controls
  • Arrows to move
  • Mouse Left Click to shot
Team:

3D Artist - Tom Le Lann @vorunah

2D Artist - Emmanuel Dodet @dodet

Programming - Kevin Pedatte @kpedatte
